text: PBMCs from CF patients and controls show similar increases in caspase-1 activity upon inflammasome activation .

PBMCs from CF patients ( n = 6 ) and healthy controls ( n = 6 ) were primed with LPS ( 10 ng / ml ) for 5 hours prior to stimulation with ATP ( 5 mM ) for 1 hour or Poly ( dA : dT ) ( 1 microg / ml ) for 3 hours .
PBMCs were stimulated with P . aeruginosa strain PAO1 for 3 hours .
A representative histogram of the % caspase-1 - active cells is shown in ( A ) with the averaged values shown in ( B ) .
